name: THRESHOLDVN demo
description:
THRESHOLDVN is a visual novel story that takes place among the Jovian lunar colonies, featuring human, robot, and anthro characters. The reader discovers and pieces together access codes in order to view scenes and progress the story, and may also use the access terminal to find information on characters, locations, events, and more.

https://www.patreon.com/thresholdvn
http://www.thresholdvn.com/

Thanks to all who take the time to give our project a look.
. . . PASIPHAE CONCERN 👁
